Asian movies.title: When I Fly Towards You
Asian movies.description: A heartwarming story of two high school students who find love and face challenges while growing up and learning about themselves.

Asian movies.title: A River Runs Through It
Asian movies.description: A story of love, growth, and challenges set against the backdrop of a river and the students' journey through school and life.

Asian movies.title: First Love
Asian movies.description: A beautiful love story about a shy high school girl and a popular boy who experience the ups and downs of first love.

Asian movies.title: Go Ahead
Asian movies.description: Three young people from broken families find solace in each other, navigating their way through adolescence and personal struggles.

Asian movies.title: Skate Into Love
Asian movies.description: A passionate romance between a talented figure skater and a college student who excels in ice hockey, bringing them closer despite their differences.

Asian movies.title: Lovely Us
Asian movies.description: A sweet romantic comedy about two high school students who discover their feelings for each other as they go through the ups and downs of teenage life.

Asian movies.title: School 2017
Asian movies.description: A drama about the struggles of high school students as they navigate friendships, dreams, and the pressures of education.

Asian movies.description: A high school girl navigates the world of the rich and popular at an elite school while dealing with her feelings for a rebellious young man.

Asian movies.description: A young woman navigates love and relationships in a society where an app alerts people when someone nearby has romantic feelings for them.

Asian movies.description: A high school girl, who was bullied for her appearance, becomes a beauty after learning makeup, only to face new challenges in her relationships.

Asian movies.description: A high school cheerleading team faces challenges as they compete in a national championship, all while dealing with personal struggles.

Asian movies.description: A young weightlifter in college deals with love, friendship, and personal growth while pursuing her athletic dreams.

Asian movies.description: A clumsy but determined high school girl becomes involved with the most popular and genius student at her school in a comedic love story.

Asian movies.description: A story about two college students, one straight and one gay, who are forced to live together as roommates and find themselves at odds, yet eventually developing feelings for each other.

Asian movies.title: The Gifted
Asian movies.description: A lighthearted romance about a college student who pretends to be in a relationship with a popular and attractive senior in order to ward off his persistent admirer.

Asian movies.description: A drama about two college boys from rival families who have been at odds since childhood but unexpectedly find themselves in a relationship despite their differences.
